name: Hex code Detection spin-off
description: Spin-off of hex code detection by 'Cosmin Popovici'. Works with 3 letter codes as well.
content:
HEX code with numbers in it: #F0F0F0

HEX code with letters only: #FAFAFA

Works without a # in front of the code: FFF000

Works with 3 letter hex codes as well: #6A6
author: Shreyas Minocha
